issue.title: [C++] S3Filesystem shouldn't create new buckets by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15906](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15906). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
S3 buckets typically have a lot of governance around them (permissions, cost-tracking tags), so they should not be created unless a user explicitly asks.

We should add an option to `S3Options` to control whether to create buckets, and default to False.
